snippet: For all seven of L.S.U.'s home games this season, Mike the Tiger has refused to leave his well-appointed residence for the mobile cage that would take him into the stadium.
abstract: Campus Corner; refusal of Louisiana State mascot Mike the Tiger to leave his habitat for mobile cage that would take him into stadium for pregame procession has fans curious; caregivers appear unconcerned, saying newly expanded Tiger Stadium may just be too noisy for him; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: For all seven of L.S.U.'s home games this season, Mike the Tiger has refused to leave his well-appointed residence for the mobile cage that would take him into the stadium.

headline.print_headline: The Mascot Will Sit This One Out, Thanks
headline.seo: L.S.U. Mascot Mike the Tiger Chooses to Stay Home on Game Days
headline.main: The Mascot Will Sit This One Out, Thanks
